clauses: (c) The distance between manholes shall not be more than 120m.

(f) Sewer pipes connecting at grade in a manhole shall not form an acute angle with the outgoing sewer.
(d) Manholes walls, the underside of all platforms, slabs and other location shown in standard drawing shall have HDPE lining.
